title: 96/164/EC: Commission Decision of 7 February 1996 on the carrying out of Community trials and tests on propagating and planting material of certain species pursuant to Article 20 (2) of Council Directive 92/34/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 7 February 1996 on the carrying out of Community trials and tests on propagating and planting material of certain species pursuant to Article 20 (2) of Council Directive 92/34/EEC (96/164/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Community trials and tests shall be carried out during 1996 on propagating and planting material of Fragaria × ananassa and Ribes.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 February 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 157, 10. 6. 1992, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 36, 16. 2. 1995, p. 36.
